actions.committee: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
actions.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Lieberman with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 111-103.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 223.
Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for grants to the States participating in the Emergency Management Assistance Compact, and for other purposes.
short_title: Emergency Management Assistance Compact Grant Reauthorization Act of 2009

summary.text: Emergency Management Assistance Compact Grant Reauthorization Act of 2009 - Amends the Post-Katrina Emergency Management Reform Act of 2006 to authorize appropriations for Emergency Management Assistance Compact grants for FY2010-FY2012.

titles.title: Emergency Management Assistance Compact Reauthorization Act of 2009

A bill to authorize appropriations for grants to the States participating in the Emergency Management Assistance Compact, and for other purposes.
